block.p: N.B.A.
SACRAMENTO KINGS--Fired Eric Musselman, coach.
FOOTBALL

N.F.L. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Signed DL Michael Myers to a two-year contract. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed WR Ernest Wilford and QB Quinn Gray. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Fired Bobby Williams, running backs coach. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Announced the retirement of OT Sean Bubin.
Canadian Football League TORONTO ARGONAUTS--Signed OT Woodly Telfort and OT Henry Tellis. WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Re-signed WR Quentin McCord and S John Sullivan.

Arena Football League ARIZONA RATTLERS--Signed OL-DL Brandon Phillips from the practice squad. Released DB Joseph Todd. AUSTIN WRANGLERS--Signed DL Terrance Ford from the New Orleans practice squad and WR Sakeen Wright from the practice squad. CHICAGO RUSH--Signed WR Rob Mager. GEORGIA FORCE--Signed OL Reggie Jiles from the practice squad. Waived OL Lawrence Smith. LAS VEGAS GLADIATORS--Signed DB Sidney Haugabrook from the practice squad. PHILADELPHIA SOUL--Signed WR Scottie Vines and QB Clint Stoerner. SAN JOSE SABERCATS--Re-signed WR Cleannord Saintil.
HOCKEY

N.H.L. NHL--Suspended Islanders D Sean Hill for 20 games for violating the terms of the NHL/NHLPA Performance Enhancing Substances Program. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Recalled F Patrick Leahy from Milwaukee (AHL). RANGERS--Signed F Colton Orr, F Ryan Hollweg and D Thomas Pock to contract extensions and D Bobby Sanguinetti. ECHL--Suspended Toledo D Brett Angel for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions in an April 14 game.
M.L.S.
D.C. UNITED--Named Pete Calabrese assistant trainer and strength and conditioning coach.
COLLEGE

GREAT FALLS--Announced the resignation of Asha Dean, cross country coach. INDIANA-PURDUE-FT. WAYNE--Announced the resignation of Mark Pope, A.D. IOWA--Announced freshman F Tyler Smith has been granted a release from the men's basketball team. OHIO STATE--Announced freshman C Greg Oden, freshman G Mike Conley Jr. and freshman G-F Daequan Cook will make themselves available for the NBA draft. PRINCETON--Named Sydney Johnson men's basketball coach. SAN DIEGO--Named Bill Carr men's associate basketball coach and Walter Roese and Kyle Bankhead men's assistant basketball coaches. SAN FRANCISCO--Named Dan Fisher and Samantha Hartwell assistant volleyball coaches.
N.B.A.

ECHL--Suspended Toledo D Brett Angel for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions in an April 14 game.
